page.name: Kligler & Weeks 2014, Langevin et al 2001 and MacPherson et al. 2016
page.content:
Reading Assignments:

Read the following articles.  As you read, consider the following questions:

  1. What are the implications from the Langevin et al 2001 article as to the anatomical basis of the meridian system?
  2. From the MacPherson article, which insight from the study of acupuncture has been the most influential?
  3. Kligler and Weeks recommend the use of case studies.  Would you be willing to write case studies from your practice?
  • Langevin et al 2001 Article
  • MacPherson et al 2016 Article
  • Kligler and Weeks 2014 Article
